name: Adrian Was Left Behind - Matt Aspland Game Jam
name_original: Adrian Was Left Behind - Matt Aspland Game Jam
description:
Adrian was left behind is a 2D puzzle platformer about a boy who was kidnapped by a company. Play as a boy and communicate with Adrian, another person who was kidnapped by the company and find a way to escape...

All programming was made by me. Most art was made by me with the exception of a few made by Kenney Assets - https://kenney.nl/assets

The menu and game soundtracks were made by me. But the last soundtrack (my favourite) was made by my good friend Nyk Verse -
